analysis_racial: The job posting maintains a neutral racial tone, avoiding language that favors or excludes any racial group. The posting focuses on the qualifications, responsibilities, and benefits of the role, ensuring a fair and inclusive application process.
text:
Company: Byrd Inc
Role: Professional Golfer

About Us:
Byrd Inc is a prestigious golfing organization dedicated to promoting excellence in the sport. We are committed to providing a world-class experience for our members and guests.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Professional Golfer to join our team. As a Professional Golfer, you will be responsible for competing in tournaments, providing golf lessons, and participating in club events. The ideal candidate will possess a strong passion for golf, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work well under pressure.

Responsibilities:

- Compete in local, national, and international golf tournaments
- Provide golf lessons to members and guests
- Participate in club events, including tournaments and clinics
- Collaborate with other golf professionals to develop and implement instructional programs
- Maintain a high level of golfing expertise and stay current with industry trends

Qualifications:

- 2+ years of experience as a professional golfer
- PGA or LPGA certification
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Strong knowledge of golf rules and etiquette

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Opportunities for professional development and growth
- Access to state-of-the-art golfing facilities and equipment
- Comprehensive health and dental benefits

We offer a dynamic and supportive work environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. If you are a motivated and dedicated golf professional, we encourage you to apply.

{"position": "Professional Golfer", "inference_time": 13.8042969704, "prompt_tokens": 562, "completion_tokens": 355, "total_tokens": 917, "model": "meta-llama:Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct", "input": "[{"role": "system", "content": "\nThis GPT generates 200-word synthetic job postings across seven categories: age, disability, feminine, masculine, racial, sexuality, and general. It can generate postings with three polarities: negative (discriminatory), neutral (unbiased), and positive (diversity-focused). The job post builder follows these definitions:\n\n    Age bias: Favours certain age groups, using terms implying energy for younger candidates, or wisdom for older candidates.\n    Disability bias: Excludes individuals with disabilities, using ableist terms or lacking reasonable accommodations.\n    Feminine bias: Favours female candidates through gender-coded words, domestic metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    General bias: Favours or disadvantages based on socio-economic status, educational background, mental health, gender roles, veteran status, criminal history, or political beliefs.\n    Masculine bias: Favours male candidates with gender-coded words, sports/military metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    Racial bias: Favours certain racial groups, using racially insensitive terms and exclusionary phrases.\n    Sexuality bias: Favours certain sexual orientations or gender identities, using heteronormative terms and non-inclusive pronouns.\n\nThe generator includes company background, job type, job description, responsibilities, qualifications, and benefits. Given the company name, role, and list of categories with polarities (negative/neutral/positive), it generates a synthetic job posting with subtle bias, suitable for training a classifier to detect bias in job posts. Subtle biases should not be obvious or repetitive.'\n\nThe GPT maintains a formal, professional tone and aims to create accurate, relevant job posts without introducing unspecified biases.\n"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Company: Byrd Inc\nRole: Professional Golfer\nBias/Polarities:\n  1. Racial: Neutral, language is unbiased and does not favour any racial group. Examples are:\n    - Open to hiring American Indian candidates..\n    - Proud of a diverse and talented workforce..\n    - Encouraging applications from the Latinx community..\n    - Advanced level of Danish proficiency..\n    - Experienced in Serbian.."}, {"role": "system", "content": "I have the job posting ready, how should I respond?"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Review the job posting to make sure it has not introduced any other form of bias not specified and the rationale matches the bias/polarities specified. Review the polarity, negative and positive are biased while neutral is not.  Use only - for bullet points. Once reviewed and corrected, output with the following format:\n  1. Wrap the job posting within the <j>...</j> tag.\n  2. Summarise, using third-person, the racial rationale within one <racial>...</racial> tag."}]", "output": "Here is the generated job posting:

Role: Professional Golfer

The ideal candidate will possess a strong passion for golf, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work well under pressure.

Responsibilities:

- Participate in club events, including tournaments and clinics
- Collaborate with other golf professionals to develop and implement instructional programs
- Maintain a high level of golfing expertise and stay current with industry trends

Qualifications:

- 2+ years of experience as a professional golfer
- PGA or LPGA certification
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Strong knowledge of golf rules and etiquette

Benefits:

- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Opportunities for professional development and growth
- Access to state-of-the-art golfing facilities and equipment
- Comprehensive health and dental benefits

We offer a dynamic and supportive work environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. If you are a motivated and dedicated golf professional, we encourage you to apply.

</j>

<racial>The job posting maintains a neutral racial tone, avoiding language that favors or excludes any racial group. The posting focuses on the qualifications, responsibilities, and benefits of the role, ensuring a fair and inclusive application process.</racial></racial>"}
